trans-unit.source: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 此委派封裝之方法的第一個參數類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 此委派封裝之方法的第二個參數類型。

trans-unit.source: The first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 此委派封裝之方法的第一個參數。

trans-unit.source: The second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 此委派封裝之方法的第二個參數。

trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a method that has two parameters and does not return a value.
trans-unit.target: 封裝具有 2 個參數且沒有傳回值的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Action%602> delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Action%602>要做為參數傳遞給方法，而不必明確宣告自訂委派的委派。

trans-unit.source: The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate.
trans-unit.target: 封裝的方法必須對應至這個委派所定義的方法簽章。

trans-unit.source: This means that the encapsulated method must have two parameters that are both passed to it by value, and it must not return a value.
trans-unit.target: 這表示封裝的方法必須同時傳遞給它的值，兩個參數，而且必須傳回值。

trans-unit.source: (In C#, the method must return `void`.
trans-unit.target: (在 C# 中，此方法必須傳回`void`。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub`
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中，它必須定義的`Sub`...`End Sub`

trans-unit.source: construct.
trans-unit.target: 建構。

trans-unit.source: It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.) Typically, such a method is used to perform an operation.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以傳回值，則會忽略這個值的方法。）通常，這種方法用來執行作業。

trans-unit.source: To reference a method that has two parameters and returns a value, use the generic <xref:System.Func%603> delegate instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考的方法有兩個參數並傳回值，使用泛型<xref:System.Func%603>改為委派。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Action%602> delegate, you do not have to explicitly define a delegate that encapsulates a method with two parameters.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Action%602>委派，您不需要明確定義這個委派會封裝具有兩個參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code explicitly declares a delegate named `ConcatStrings`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列程式碼明確宣告委派，名為`ConcatStrings`。

trans-unit.source: It then assigns a reference to either of two methods to its delegate instance.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其中一種方法的參考指派給其委派執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One method writes two strings to the console; the second writes two strings to a file.
trans-unit.target: 一種方法會將兩個字串寫入主控台。第二個會將兩個字串寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following example simplifies this code by instantiating the <xref:System.Action%602> delegate instead of explicitly defining a new delegate and assigning a named method to it.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會具現化來簡化此程式碼<xref:System.Action%602>而不是明確地定義新的委派，並為其指派具名的方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Action%602> delegate with anonymous methods in C#, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Action%602>委派與 C# 中的匿名方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: (For an introduction to anonymous methods, see [Anonymous Methods](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md).)
trans-unit.target: (如匿名方法的簡介，請參閱[匿名方法](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md)。)

trans-unit.source: You can also assign a lambda expression to an <xref:System.Action%602> delegate instance, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指派 lambda 運算式給<xref:System.Action%602>委派執行個體，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: (For an introduction to lambda expressions, see [Lambda Expressions](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md).)
trans-unit.target: (如需 lambda 運算式的簡介，請參閱[Lambda 運算式](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md)。)
